DOC.detailed_description: Several study report relationship plasma phytosterol concentration parenteral nutrition-associated cholestasis ( PNAC ) . Information plasma phytosterols half-lives very-low-birth-weight ( VLBW ) preterm infant lipid parenteral nutrition ( PN ) lack . In prospective cohort study , plasma phytosterols ( campesterol , stigmasterol sitosterol ) VLBW preterm infant routine PN measure gas chromatography-mass spectrometry ( GC-MS ) PN administration lipid stop . Plasma phytosterols half-lives calculated monoexponential decay curve . Blood sample weekly collect 1st 7th week life routine metabolic tolerance analysis gas-analysis order avoid burden additional phlebotomy . Samples collect ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid-tubes immediately centrifugate . Plasma store pyrogallol added-tubes -20°C analysis . Saponification reaction do use 5-alpha-cholestane internal standard .
DOC.criteria: 24 week < gestational age < 32 week ; 500 g ≤ birth weight < 1250 g ; parenteral nutrition soy oilbased lipid emulsion first hour life ; parental consent . length parenteral nutrition > 24 day ; severe malformation ; inborn error metabolism ; severe congenital sepsis ; liver dysfunction .
